unlinkedwikibase-error-label: Label shown before any error message.
unlinkedwikibase-error-invalid-id:
Error message displayed when an invalid entity ID is provided.

Parameters:
* $1 — The supplied ID value.
unlinkedwikibase-error-missing-id: Error message displayed when the 'id' parameter is not given.
unlinkedwikibase-error-property-name-not:
Error message displayed when a property name or ID couldn't be found.

Parameters:
* $1 — The supplied name or ID.
unlinkedwikibase-sidebar-link: Label for the link in the sidebar's toolbox.
unlinkedwikibase-infoaction-label: Label in the table on ?action=info, shown next to the page's Wikibase ID.
unlinkedwikibase-infoaction-other-usage: Text shown after the page's Wikibase ID to indicate how many pages use this ID.
